DOC.detailed_description: Background : The impact mechanical simulator practice clinical ERCP performance report . Hypothesis : Practice mechanical simulator improve clinical ERCP performance novice trainee . Design : A prospective randomized control trial . Method : 8 trainee without prior ERCP experience 2 hospital attend didactic lecture ERCP . They randomize pair ( per hospital ) receive simulator practice usual training ( S ) versus usual training control ( C ) . Simulator practice include selective bile pancreatic duct cannulation use catheter and/or guide wire different artificial papilla ( flat , standard , dual channel ) setting ( standard , rotate papilla duodenum ) , exchange guide wire/accessories biliary stenting . Local trainer track trainee ' subsequent clinical ERCP performance 3 month . Evaluation trainee skill include success diagnostic CBD deep CBD cannulation . Trainer blind randomization provide assessment ( 1=poor , 5=excellent ) trainee perform ERCP . Statistics : Fisher exact test Mann-Whitney U test .
